question.questionText: The sand and flour in the gray material from mock rocks is separated by mixing with water and allowing the mixture to settle. Explain why the sand and flour separate.

referenceAnswers.referenceAnswer: The sand particles are larger and settle first. The flour particles are smaller and therefore settle more slowly.
